original_text: And it came to pass, that, as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God, he stood by the lake of Gennesaret,
korean_text: 무리가 몰려와서 하나님의 말씀을 들을새 예수는 게네사렛 호숫가에 서서

sentences.original_text: that, as the people pressed upon him
to hear the word of God
he stood by the lake of Gennesaret
